title: why are juggernauts carrying teams so common
body:
most of the time when i see a champ carrying a team, its usually a kled, darius, illaoi, garen, or something along that line which can 1v3 us
why is it always the juggernaut

replies.body: think about all the types of champs in league. we have main groups to classify them. bruisers are front line fighters that are tanky and do damage. tanks are more tanky than bruisers but do less damage. marksman and mage champs do the most damage in a teamfight but they are squishy so stay at the backline. assassins try to kill the backline. because of the roles in the team, the only ones who can actually 1v3 consistently are tanks and bruisers because the other champs cant survive/have singe target damage. tanks dont have enough damage but bruisers do. thats why i like tryndamere :P

Because they are designed to do so?

All those champs you said are easily countered by good teamplay or CC. Which is why they are good low elo shit stompers, because there is no such thing as team play in low elo.
